articles.description: DesignCafé has raised $4.8 million (Rs 40 crore) in a follow-on Series B round led by existing investor WestBridge Capital

articles.title: Meta verified blue tick for Facebook and Instagram to cost Rs 1,450 a month on mobile - The Indian Express
articles.description: Meta Verified will cost a whopping Rs 1,450/month on mobile devices and the same will cost Rs 1,099/month if subscribed from a web browser in India.
